titleStmt.title: A devout exposition of the holie Masse with an ample declaration of all the rites and ceremonies belonging to the same / composed by Iohn Heigham the more to moue all godlie people to the greater veneration of so sublime a sacrament.
titleStmt.author: Heigham, John, fl. 1639.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
